Header: Navy Commander calls over on Maha Nayaka Theras
Content: Navy Commander Rear Admiral Piyal de Silva called on the Anu Nayaka of the Malwathu Chapter Dimbul-kumbure Wimala-dhamma Thera and received his blessings. The new Navy Commander after meeting the Anu Nayaka of Malwathu Chapter made an observation tour of the development projects implemented by the Navy at the Malwathu Maha Viharaya. Thereafter he went to Asgiri Maha Viharaya and met the Maha Nayaka of Asgiri Chapter Most Venerable Warakagoda Gnanarathana Thera and received his blessings.
